note:
I work for a national telecommunications company to help ensure accessibility across web and mobile. I code for leisure, profit and accessibility.
I geek out on sci-fi movies and am constantly reading.
I enjoy the odd game here and there.
I watch comedy with my wife, Disney/Marvel with my daughter, and late-night horror with the dog.
I listen to classical when working, and scare off cats to pop, showtunes and country when tidying.
